mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_rs_employee_dept WHERE person_id = #{personId} AND dept_id = #{deptId}

SELECT e.person_id, e.sex, u.user_account, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.sex,'XB') sexShow, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.job,'GW') jobShow, e.entry_date entryDate, to_char(e.entry_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') entryDateShow, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.marital_status,'HYZK') maritalStatusShow, e.name, e.address, e.nation, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.nation,'MZ') nationShow, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.sex,'XB') sexShow, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.ID_TYPE,'SFZJLX') idTypeShow, e.IDCARD idCard, e.NATIVE_PLACE nativePlace, e.PERMANENT_RESIDENCE permanentResidence, e.PERMANENT_RESIDENCE_LOCAL permanentResidenceLocal, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.EXAMINE_POLITICAL,'SF') examinePoliticalShow, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.political_status,'ZZMM') politicalStatusShow, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.EDUCATIONAL_LEVEL,'WHCD') educationalLevelShow, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.EDUCATION_TECHNIQUE,'JYFS') educationTechniqueShow, e.GRADUATE_SCHOOL graduateSchool, e.major major, e.GRADUATE_TIME graduateTime, to_char(e.GRADUATE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') graduateTimeShow, e.POSITIONAL_TITLES positionalTitles, e.POSITIONAL_LEVEL positionalLevel, e.remark remark, e.birthday birthday, to_char(e.birthday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') birthdayShow, to_char(sysdate,'YYYY')-to_char(e.birthday, 'YYYY') age, e.valid_flag, d.dept_id, d.dept_name, e.tel, e.STAFF_STATUS staffStatus , FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.STAFF_STATUS,'JZGZT') staffStatusShow FROM t_rs_employee e, t_sys_dept d, t_rs_employee_dept ed, t_sys_user u WHERE e.person_id = ed.person_id AND ed.dept_id = d.dept_id AND u.user_id = e.person_id AND e.valid_flag = '1'
and d.dept_id = '${deptId}'
ORDER BY u.USER_ACCOUNT

SELECT e.person_id, e.sex, u.user_account, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.sex,'XB') sexShow, e.name, e.address, e.nation, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.nation,'MZ') nationShow, e.birthday, e.idcard, e.valid_flag, d.dept_id, d.dept_name, e.tel FROM t_rs_employee e, t_sys_dept d, t_rs_employee_dept ed, t_sys_user u WHERE e.person_id = ed.person_id AND ed.dept_id = d.dept_id AND u.user_id = e.person_id AND e.valid_flag = '1' AND e.NAME like #{NAME} ORDER BY u.USER_ACCOUNT

SELECT e.person_id, e.sex, u.user_account, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.sex,'XB') sexShow, e.name, e.address, e.nation, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.nation,'MZ') nationShow, e.birthday, e.valid_flag, d.dept_id, d.dept_name deptName, e.tel, e.IDCARD, e.STAFF_STATUS staffStatus , FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.STAFF_STATUS,'JZGZT') staffStatusShow FROM t_rs_employee e, t_sys_dept d, t_rs_employee_dept ed, t_sys_user u WHERE e.person_id = ed.person_id AND ed.dept_id = d.dept_id AND u.user_id = e.person_id
AND d.dept_id like '${deptId}%'
AND e.name like '%${name}%'
AND e.IDCARD like '%${idCard}%'
AND e.valid_flag = '1'
SELECT e.person_id, e.sex, e.name, e.address, e.nation, e.birthday, e.staff_id, e.idcard, e.valid_flag, e.tel FROM t_rs_employee e WHERE e.person_id = #{person_id}

SELECT e.person_id, e.sex, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.sex,'XB') sexShow, e.name, e.address, e.nation, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.nation,'MZ') nationShow, e.birthday, e.idcard, e.valid_flag, d.dept_id, d.dept_name, e.tel, e.nationality, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.nationality,'GJ') nationalityShow, e.staff_id staffId, e.used_name usedName, e.id_type idType, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.id_type,'SFZJLX') idTypeShow, e.native_place_province nativePlaceProvince, e.native_place_city nativePlaceCity, e.native_place_county nativePlaceCounty, e.birth_place birthPlace, e.political_status politicalStatus, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.political_status,'ZZMM') politicalStatusShow, e.marital_status maritalStatus, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.marital_status,'HYZK') maritalStatusShow, e.health_status healthStatus, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.health_status,'JKZK') healthStatusShow, e.work_time workTime, e.to_school_time toSchoolTime, e.staff_source staffSource, decode(e.staff_belongs,1,FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.staff_source,'JZGLY2') ,2,FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.staff_source,'JZGLY')) staffSourceShow, e.staff_type staffType, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.staff_type,'JZGLB') staffTypeShow, e.staff_flag staffFlag, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.staff_flag,'SF') staffFlagShow, e.employe_form employeForm, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.employe_form,'YRXS') employeFormShow, e.contract_type contractType, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.contract_type,'QDHTQK') contractTypeShow, e.technical_skills technicalSkills, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.technical_skills,'XXJSYYNL') technicalSkillsShow, e.double_type_flag doubleTypeFlag, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.double_type_flag,'SF') doubleTypeFlagShow, e.credentials_flag credentialsFlag, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.credentials_flag,'SF') credentialsFlagShow, e.stunt_teacher_flag stuntTeacherFlag, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.stunt_teacher_flag,'SF') stuntTeacherFlagShow, e.work_year workYear, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.work_year,'QYGZSC') workYearShow, e.staff_status staffStatus, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.staff_status,'JZGZT') staffStatusShow, e.staff_belongs staffBelongs , e.job job, e.NATIVE_PLACE nativePlace, e.ENTRY_DATE entryDate, e.PERMANENT_RESIDENCE permanentResidence, e.PERMANENT_RESIDENCE_LOCAL permanentResidenceLocal, e.EDUCATIONAL_LEVEL educationalLevel, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.EDUCATIONAL_LEVEL,'WHCD') educationalLevelShow, e.GRADUATE_SCHOOL graduateSchool, e.GRADUATE_TIME graduateTime, e.major major, e.POSITIONAL_TITLES positionalTitles, e.POSITIONAL_LEVEL positionalLevel, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.POSITIONAL_LEVEL,'ZCJB') positionalLevelShow, e.class_positions classPositions, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.class_positions,'ZJ') classPositionsShow, e.examine_political examinePolitical, e.education_technique educationTechnique, e.REMARK remark, e.post post, e.academic_degree academicDegree, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.academic_degree,'XW') academicDegreeShow, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.staff_status,'JZGSS') staffBelongsShow , u.ID_CARD_PHOTO_URL photoUrl FROM t_rs_employee e, t_sys_dept d, t_rs_employee_dept ed, T_SYS_USER u WHERE e.person_id = u.user_id AND e.person_id = ed.person_id AND ed.dept_id = d.dept_id AND d.dept_id = #{deptId} AND e.person_id = #{personId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_rs_employee ( person_id,name,sex,idcard, birthday,address,nation,creator, create_time,create_dept,valid_flag, tel, nationality,staff_id,used_name,id_type, native_place_province,native_place_city,native_place_county, birth_place,political_status,marital_status,health_status, work_time,to_school_time,staff_source,staff_type, staff_flag,contract_type,technical_skills,double_type_flag, credentials_flag,stunt_teacher_flag,work_year, staff_status,staff_belongs,employe_form,job,native_place,entry_date, permanent_residence,permanent_residence_local,examine_political, educational_level,education_technique,graduate_school,graduate_time, major,positional_titles,positional_level,remark,class_positions,post,academic_degree ) VALUES ( #{personId},#{name},#{sex},#{idCard}, to_date('${birthday}','yyyy-mm-dd'),#{address},#{nation},#{creator}, sysdate,#{createDept},#{validFlag}, #{tel}, #{nationality},#{staffId},#{usedName},#{idType}, #{nativePlaceProvince},#{nativePlaceCity},#{nativePlaceCounty}, #{birthPlace},#{politicalStatus},#{maritalStatus},#{healthStatus}, to_date('${workTime}','yyyy-mm-dd'),to_date('${toSchoolTime}','yyyy-mm-dd'),#{staffSource},#{staffType}, #{staffFlag},#{contractType},#{technicalSkills},#{doubleTypeFlag}, #{credentialsFlag},#{stuntTeacherFlag},#{workYear}, #{staffStatus},#{staffBelongs},#{employeForm},#{job}, #{nativePlace},to_date('${entryDate}','yyyy-mm-dd'), #{permanentResidence},#{permanentResidenceLocal},#{examinePolitical}, #{educationalLevel},#{educationTechnique},#{graduateSchool},to_date('${graduateTime}','yyyy-mm-dd'), #{major},#{positionalTitles},#{positionalLevel},#{remark},#{classPositions},#{post},#{academicDegree} )

INSERT INTO t_rs_employee_dept ( id, person_id, dept_id, person_order, creator, create_time, create_dept, valid_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{personId}, #{deptId}, #{personOrder}, #{creator}, sysdate, #{createDept}, #{validFlag} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_rs_employee SET
sex=#{sex},
address=#{address},
name=#{name},
idcard=#{idCard},
nation = #{nation},
birthday = to_date('${birthday}','yyyy-mm-dd'),
tel=#{tel},
change_dept=#{changeDept},
nationality=#{nationality},
staff_id=#{staffId},
used_name=#{usedName},
id_type=#{idType},
native_place_province=#{nativePlaceProvince},
native_place_city=#{nativePlaceCity},
native_place_county=#{nativePlaceCounty},
birth_place=#{birthPlace},
political_status=#{politicalStatus},
marital_status=#{maritalStatus},
health_status=#{healthStatus},
work_time=#{workTime},
to_school_time=#{toSchoolTime},
staff_source=#{staffSource},
staff_type=#{staffType},
staff_flag=#{staffFlag},
contract_type=#{contractType},
technical_skills=#{technicalSkills},
double_type_flag=#{doubleTypeFlag},
credentials_flag=#{credentialsFlag},
stunt_teacher_flag=#{stuntTeacherFlag},
work_year=#{workYear},
staff_status=#{staffStatus},
staff_belongs=#{staffBelongs},
employe_form=#{employeForm},
job=#{job},
NATIVE_PLACE=#{nativePlace},
ENTRY_DATE = #{entryDate},
PERMANENT_RESIDENCE=#{permanentResidence},
PERMANENT_RESIDENCE_LOCAL=#{permanentResidenceLocal},
EXAMINE_POLITICAL=#{examinePolitical},
EDUCATIONAL_LEVEL=#{educationalLevel},
EDUCATION_TECHNIQUE=#{educationTechnique},
GRADUATE_SCHOOL=#{graduateSchool},
GRADUATE_TIME = #{graduateTime},
MAJOR=#{major},
POSITIONAL_TITLES=#{positionalTitles},
POSITIONAL_LEVEL=#{positionalLevel},
remark=#{remark},
post=#{post},
CLASS_POSITIONS=#{classPositions},
ACADEMIC_DEGREE=#{academicDegree},
VALID_FLAG = '1', change_time=sysdate, changer=#{changer} WHERE person_id = #{personId}
UPDATE t_rs_employee SET valid_flag = '0' WHERE person_id = #{personId}

UPDATE t_rs_employee_dept SET valid_flag = '0' WHERE person_id = #{personId}
and dept_id = #{deptId}
mapper.select: SELECT dept_id FROM t_rs_employee_dept WHERE person_id = #{personId}
SELECT phone FROM t_rs_employee WHERE person_id = #{personId}
SELECT FUNC_GET_DEPTNAME(dept_id) as deptId , COUNT (1) as personOrder FROM T_RS_EMPLOYEE_DEPT t WHERE valid_flag = '1' and t.dept_id like func_get_range(#{dept},'6') GROUP BY t.dept_id
SELECT name from t_rs_employee WHERE person_id = #{personId}
SELECT distinct FUNC_GET_USERNAME(e.PERSON_ID) personName FROM T_ZW_REPAIR_EXECUTE e where e.id= #{repairId}
SELECT dept_name from t_sys_dept WHERE dept_id = #{deptId}
SELECT u.user_level as "level" FROM T_SYS_USER u WHERE u.USER_ID = #{personId}
SELECT DIC_CODE id, DIC_NAME text FROM T_SYS_DIC WHERE PARENT_ID = (SELECT ID FROM T_SYS_DIC WHERE DIC_CODE = 'TYJB')
mapper.update: UPDATE T_SYS_USER SET user_level = #{level} WHERE USER_ID = #{personId}
mapper.select: SELECT role_id id,0 pid,role_name name FROM t_sys_role
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_rs_employee_dept_role WHERE person_id = #{personId} AND dept_id = #{deptId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_rs_employee WHERE idcard = #{idCard}
SELECT * FROM t_rs_employee WHERE idcard = #{idCard}
SELECT * FROM T_SYS_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{personId}

SELECT e.person_id, e.sex, u.user_account, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.sex,'XB') sexShow, e.name, e.address, e.nation, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.nation,'MZ') nationShow, e.birthday, e.idcard, e.valid_flag, d.dept_id, d.dept_name deptName, e.tel, e.STAFF_STATUS staffStatus , FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(e.STAFF_STATUS,'JZGZT') staffStatusShow FROM t_rs_employee e, t_sys_dept d, t_rs_employee_dept ed, t_sys_user u WHERE e.person_id = ed.person_id AND ed.dept_id = d.dept_id AND u.user_id = e.person_id
AND d.dept_id like '${deptId}%'
AND e.staff_id like '%${staffId}%'
AND e.name like '%${name}%'
AND e.idcard like '%${idCard}%'
AND e.sex like '%${sex}%'
AND e.valid_flag='0'
mapper.update: UPDATE t_rs_employee SET staff_status = '100', valid_flag = '1' WHERE person_id = #{personId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_rs_employee WHERE staff_id = #{staffId}
SELECT * FROM t_rs_employee WHERE staff_id = #{staffId}
SELECT STAFF_ID FROM t_rs_employee WHERE PERSON_ID = #{personId}
select count(t.PERSON_ID) from T_RS_EMPLOYEE t where t.name = #{teacherName} group by t.name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_rs_employee ( person_id,name,sex,idcard, birthday,address,nation,creator, create_time,create_dept,valid_flag, tel, nationality,staff_id,used_name,id_type, native_place_province,native_place_city,native_place_county, birth_place,political_status,marital_status,health_status, work_time,to_school_time,staff_source,staff_type, staff_flag,contract_type,technical_skills,double_type_flag, credentials_flag,stunt_teacher_flag,work_year, staff_status,staff_belongs,employe_form,job,native_place,entry_date, permanent_residence,permanent_residence_local,examine_political, educational_level,education_technique,graduate_school,graduate_time, major,positional_titles,positional_level,remark,class_positions,post,academic_degree ) VALUES ( #{personId},#{name},#{sex},#{idCard}, to_date('${birthdayShow}','yyyy-mm-dd'),#{address},#{nation},#{creator}, sysdate,#{createDept},#{validFlag}, #{tel}, #{nationality},#{staffId},#{usedName},#{idType}, #{nativePlaceProvince},#{nativePlaceCity},#{nativePlaceCounty}, #{birthPlace},#{politicalStatus},#{maritalStatus},#{healthStatus}, to_date('${workTimeShow}','yyyy-mm-dd'),to_date('${toSchoolTimeShow}','yyyy-mm-dd'),#{staffSource},#{staffType}, #{staffFlag},#{contractType},#{technicalSkills},#{doubleTypeFlag}, #{credentialsFlag},#{stuntTeacherFlag},#{workYear}, #{staffStatus},#{staffBelongs},#{employeForm},#{job}, #{nativePlace},to_date('${entryDateShow}','yyyy-mm-dd'), #{permanentResidence},#{permanentResidenceLocal},#{examinePolitical}, #{educationalLevel},#{educationTechnique},#{graduateSchool},to_date('${graduateTimeShow}','yyyy-mm-dd'), #{major},#{positionalTitles},#{positionalLevel},#{remark},#{classPositions},#{post},#{academicDegree} )
